desc: ExoDust, commonly referred to as $EXO, is a transdimensional concentrate mined from beyond the event horizon of supermassive black holes. It is compressed into $EXO Tokens and can be harnessed to provide clean and infinitely renewable energy that will have utility in the game. The $EXO token will be essential for all participants of the ExoWorlds ecosystem. It brings four core utilities: Special Access to Game Features, Asset Purchasing, Voting, and Staking.
